summary: **Futurama** is an American animated sci-fi comedy made by Matt Groening. It follows Philip J. Fry, who wakes up 1,000 years in the future after being frozen. He works at Planet Express with Leela, a mutant, and Bender, a robot. The show was first on Fox, then revived by Comedy Central and Hulu. It's about Fry's adventures in the year 3000. Futurama has won many awards and is loved by critics. It's been made into movies, video games, and more.
title: Futurama
